name: Oakridge Business Park
about: Oakridge Business Park is a sanctuary within the city that offers diverse dining, retail and lifestyle choices as well as personalized business opportunities and event celebrations, all set in its refreshing green and open spaces that‚Äôs distinctly Oakridge. It is Cebu's most exclusive business address that caters to discerning clientele with food and retail brands, and features two large-scale event venues: the Oakridge Pavilion and the Oakridge Horizons. It is home to the Oakridge Executive Club, Cebu‚Äôs first prestige business club for the comfort and convenience of executives.
address: 880 A. S. Fortuna Street, Mandaue 6014 Philippines

attributes.popularity: #9 of 11 things to do in Cebu Island

name: Terrazas de Flores
about: Terrazas de Flores is a flower terraces botanical garden in Malubog, shortly after Busay and approximately 15 minutes away from Cebu IT Park. Proudly a Cebuano work of art, the garden was built by local farmers of the Highlands of Cebu City, using the technique of interlocking stones. Terrazas de Flores was originally created by a father to express his love for his three children. Truly a labor of love, it took 8 years to create what is now Cebu's newest destination for nature lovers. 127 species of beautiful tropical flora as well as music, poetry and paintings surround the garden. Our cafe offers light meals, desserts, coffee and other refreshments. Cozy cabanas and viewing decks are great spots to unwind and bask in nature's glory. Come up and indulge in lush greens, exquisite blooms, cool breeze and absolute serenity!

about: At the Santa Fe Butterfly Garden, now considered by many as the number 1 butterfly exhibit in the Philippines, we showcase up to 22 species of live butterflies in our beautiful enclosed garden. We provide our guests with a brief educational tour, a visit to our breeding area and to hand release newly hatched adults on their first flight. We also have a great restaurant and Karaoke under the stars 7 nights a week. name: Charlie's Corner
about: Everyone's invited to discover! Come to Charlie's corner Restobar. A clean, air-conditioned and open-air venue that fits your desire of comfort. We are located at The Ridges Commercial Center besides Sykes Asia just 5-10 min drive from Ayala Mall. You've got a reason to visit our cozy, relaxing venue perfect for group gatherings, business meetings, foodtriping or just get chilled after the end of the day or for the weekend. We're at the heart of the metro yet apart from bustling city streets yet easy to reach by jeepney and taxi cab... (Great to Discover!) We serve authentic, mouth watering Asian, American, European foods during lunch and dinner that soothe your appetite at reasonable price. (Two thumbs up!) Party at night? Definitely it's a party people's love to pick and choose from variety of cold and fancy drinks that would complete the night out such as beers, cocktails, long drinks and more ... Of course together with great music such as house, trance, clubmix surely you'll gonna enjoy your dinning and jamming experience. Real party starts at 10 pm to 3 am, and during Friday and Saturday , party with the DJ playing nonstop clubmix till dawn. It's time to discover the new spot for partying all night, and definitely it's more fun in Charlie's corner. Fun to eat, fun to party!
address: Ridges Bldg. (Besides Sykes Asia Bldg.) Mabolo, Cebu City 6000 Philippines
